languages.text: {n}В возникшей тишине слышны щелчки — Хейнрикс уже какое-то время пытается оживить свой вокс-передатчик. Судя по перекошенному лицу, преуспеть в этом ему не удалось.{/n}
{n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В возникшей тишине слышны щелчки — Хейнрикс уже какое-то время пытается оживить свой вокс-передатчик. Судя по перекошенному лицу, преуспеть в этом ему не удалось.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by his wry face.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}沉默之中传来了好几次咔哒声。海因里希一直在努力恢复音阵通讯，但从他抽搐的嘴角来看，他的尝试毫无效果。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沉默之中传来了好几次咔哒声。海因里希一直在努力恢复音阵通讯，但从他严峻的表情来看，他的尝试毫无效果。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}In der Stille, die folgt, sind leise Klicks zu hören. Heinrix versucht nun schon seit einer Weile, seinen Vox-Transmitter wieder zum Leben zu erwecken — vergeblich, seiner Miene nach zu urteilen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Stille, die folgt, sind leise Klicks zu hören. Heinrix versucht nun schon seit einer Weile, seinen Vox-Transmitter wieder zum Leben zu erwecken — vergeblich, seiner Miene nach zu urteilen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una serie de chasquidos rompen el silencio. Heinrix lleva un rato intentando reparar su vocotransmisor; en vano, a juzgar por la mueca de sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una serie de chasquidos rompen el silencio. Heinrix lleva un rato intentando reparar su vocotransmisor; en vano, a juzgar por su expresión cariacontecida.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Des cliquetis résonnent dans le silence qui s'ensuit. Depuis un moment déjà, Heinrix tente de faire fonctionner son transmetteur-vox ; sans succès, au vu de la grimace déformant ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des cliquetis résonnent dans le silence qui s'ensuit. Depuis un moment déjà, Heinrix tente de faire fonctionner son transmetteur-vox ; sans succès, au vu de sa grimace.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}静寂の中、カチッという音が響く。唇をねじ曲げた表情からすると、ここしばらくの間、ハインリックスは自分のヴォクス・トランスミッターを生き返らせようとしていたらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}静寂の中、カチッという音が響く。唇をねじ曲げた表情からすると、ここしばらくの間、ハインリックスは自分のヴォクス・トランスミッターを生き返らせようとしていたらしい。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Süregelen sessizliğin arasında tıklama sesleri duyuluyor. Bir süredir voks vericisini çalıştırmayı deneyen Heinrix'in ağzının kıvrılışına bakılırsa çabaları meyve vermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clicks are heard in the ensuing silence. For a while now, Heinrix has been trying to bring his vox-transmitter back to life — to no avail, judging by the twist to his mouth.{/n}
